data.message: Which breed of dog would you like to have as your pet?
Purple, since no metioned it before :)
It depends on the mood at that very moment, no favourite as such.
What is the most important thing in your life?
solving a very even if small math problem or any logic problem
Stay happy and do only what you love to do. Last bt not the least, make sure that my parents are smiling and I am the reason of the smile. :)
Which city in this world would you like to live in?
Which car is your dream car?
Given a chance, which company would you like to work for ?
Which country do you think is the best place to travel?
Which is the best Bollywood comedy movie?
